entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Malbaie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
